column2: You can choose a personal patron saint or ideal to model your life after, from among the most notable of the Priscillian faith.
column3: Vous pouvez choisir un patron parmi les plus connus de la foi Priscillianistes.

column2: Peter, to whom Jesus gave the keys of heaven.
column3: Pierre, ‡ qui JÈsus confia les clefs du paradis.

column2: The true Priscillian faith was built by the tireless sacrifice, intrigue, love, and charisma of legendary martyrs and figures. I can emulate one of them as a testemant to my devotion or piety.
Saint Priscillian, the philantropic, brilliant leader of the faith.
Saint Helpidus of silver tongue, who showed Priscillian and many others the truth.
Mother Agape, she who followed Priscillian to death.
Saint Instantius, who schemed the freedom of the disciples.
Saint Marcus, the holy Aegyptian theologian.
The Twelve Patriarchs on high, God's Servants.
The Kingdom of Light: Heaven and the good in man.
You can choose a personal patron saint from among the most notable of the Insular faith.
column3: Vous pouvez choisir un saint patron parmi les plus connus de la foi insulaire.

column2: This Priscillian character is dedicated to Priscillian, the founder of the sect.
This Priscillian character is dedicated to Helpidius, the heterodox evangelical that converted Priscillian to his sect.
This Priscillian character is dedicated to Mother Agape, one of Priscillian's first followers and allegedly a female clergyman.

This Priscillian character is dedicated to Instantius, who, with others, was go good at intrigue and bribery (against false charges) that he got the Priscillian disciples' free from exile and returned to them their lands.
This Priscillian character is dedicated to Marcus, a great theologian and early advocate for Priscillianism.
Dedicated to the Twelve Heavenly Patriarchs

This Priscillian character is dedicated to the Twelve Patriarchs, the holy angelic spirits who tried and failed to liberate the souls of man, before God sent Jesus to do so on the Cross and Ressurection.
Dedicated to Serving the Kingdom of Light
This Priscillian character is dedicated to the concepts embodying the Kingdom of Light, that is, Heaven (God's domain) and all that is good in man, against the Kingdom of Darkness and the Zodiac.
